PHRASE.LANG: Step onto the second-story floor of the Playstation®Home Mansion and experience the frills of a life lived in luxury. Indulge yourself in a classic game of pool or the darts mini-game that comes included in your new game lounge. Couple that with a sleek juice bar, a library fit for a Greek scholar, and a lavishly decorated bedroom and you’re living life like a king. As an added bonus, each section of the Playstation®Home Mansion includes up to 5 unique gold rewards for you and your guests. [#Legal]

Montez au premier étage du manoir PlayStation®Home et vautrez-vous sans vergogne dans le luxe. Faites une petite partie de billard ou essayez le mini-jeu de fléchettes dans votre nouvelle salle de jeux. Profitez également d'un élégant bar à jus, d'une bibliothèque digne d'un savant grec et d'une chambre richement décorée. Une nouvelle vie royale s'offre à vous. En prime, dans chaque partie du manoir PlayStation®Home se cachent 5 récompenses en or uniques pour vous et vos invités. [#Legal]

Betreten Sie den ersten Stock der Playstation®Home-Villa und erleben Sie alle Annehmlichkeiten eines Lebens im puren Luxus. Genießen Sie eine klassische Runde Billard oder das Darts-Minispiel, das Teil Ihrer neuen Spiele-Lounge ist. Kombinieren Sie all das mit einer eleganten Saftbar, einer Bibliothek, die einem griechischen Gelehrten Ehre machen würde, und einem luxuriös ausgestatteten Schlafzimmer – schon führen Sie das Leben der Reichen und Schönen. Als zusätzlichen Bonus bietet jeder Bereich der Playstation®Home-Villa bis zu 5 einzigartige Goldbelohnungen für Sie und Ihre Freunde. [#Legal]

Sali al primo piano della villa PlayStation®Home e scopri i veri lussi della vita. Regalati una partita a biliardo o divertiti con il minigioco freccette già incluso nella nuova sala ricreativa. Completano il quadro un elegantissimo bar dove sorseggiare succhi e spremute, una biblioteca degna di un filosofo greco e una stanza da letto finemente decorata, per goderti fino in fondo la tua nuova vita da re. Come se non bastasse, ogni sezione della PlayStation®Home Mansion contiene fino a 5 esclusive ricompense in oro per te e i tuoi ospiti. [#Legal]

Sube a la primera planta de la mansión de PlayStation®Home y experimenta los placeres de una vida de lujo. Mata las horas en una partida de billar clásica o disfruta del minijuego de dardos que se incluye en tu nueva sala de juegos. A eso, súmale una estilosa barra de bar, una biblioteca digna de un erudito griego y un dormitorio magníficamente decorado, y disfrutarás a cuerpo de rey. Además, cada sección de la mansión de PlayStation®Home incluye hasta cinco premios únicos de oro para ti y tus invitados. [#Legal]

PlayStation®Home 맨션의 2층에 오르면 럭셔리한 삶이 무엇인지 느낄 수 있습니다. 당신만의 게임 라운지에 포함되어 있는 클래식 당구와 다트 미니게임을 즐기세요. 거기에 멋진 쥬스 바, 그리스의 학자들에게 어울릴만한 서재, 그리고 화려하게 장식된 침실을 더하면 진정 와의 삶을 사는 당신이 됩니다. 또한 추가 보너스로는 PlayStation®Home 맨션을 방문하는 친구들에게 최대 5개의 황금 리워드를 각기 선물할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Step onto the second-story floor of the PlayStation®Home Mansion and experience the frills of a life lived in luxury. Indulge yourself in a classic game of pool or the darts mini-game that comes included in your new game lounge. Couple that with a sleek juice bar, a library fit for a Greek scholar, and a lavishly decorated bedroom and you’re living life like a king. As an added bonus, each section of the PlayStation®Home Mansion includes up to 5 unique gold rewards for you and your guests. [#Legal]
走上PlayStation®Home豪華別墅的二樓，體驗豪華生活。盡情遊玩新遊戲大廳中附有的經典桌球遊戲或飛鏢迷你遊戲。還設有時尚的果汁吧、匹配希臘學者的圖書館及裝修奢華的睡房，讓你享受皇帝般的生活。此外，PlayStation®Home豪華別墅還包括最多5種額外黃金獎品道具給你和你的賓客。 [#Legal]
走上PlayStation®Home豪華別墅的二樓，體驗豪華生活。盡情遊玩新遊戲大廳中附有的經典桌球遊戲或飛鏢迷你遊戲。還設有時尚的果汁吧、匹配希臘學者的圖書館及裝修奢華的睡房，讓你享受皇帝般的生活。此外，PlayStation®Home豪華別墅還包括最多5種額外黃金獎品道具給你和你的賓客。 [#Legal]

Step onto the second-story floor of the PlayStation®Home Mansion and experience the frills of a life lived in luxury. Indulge yourself in a classic game of pool or the darts mini-game that comes included in your new game lounge. Couple that with a sleek juice bar, a library fit for a Greek scholar, and a lavishly decorated bedroom and you’re living life like a king. As an added bonus, each section of the PlayStation®Home Mansion includes up to 5 unique gold rewards for you and your guests. [#Legal]
